title: Cafe Kracovia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers clearly labeled vegetarian and vegan dishes, including several appetizers, main courses and desserts. Serves local artisanal beer, a variety of wines and cocktails. The grounds have picturesque gardens.
streetAddress: 50 Meters North of the Law Faculty at the UCR, San Pedro
